name: @sustainovate/root
description: The official Sustainovate platform for hosting real-time quizzes, polls, and events with live leaderboards and engagement analytics.

scripts.start:api: npm run build:shared && npm run start --workspace=apps/api
scripts.start:export: npm run build:shared && npm run start --workspace=services/export
scripts.start:jobs: npm run build:shared && npm run start --workspace=services/jobs
scripts.start:all: npm run build && npm run pm2:start
scripts.dev:api: npm run build:shared && npm run dev --workspace=apps/api
scripts.dev:export: npm run build:shared && npm run dev --workspace=services/export
scripts.dev:jobs: npm run build:shared && npm run dev --workspace=services/jobs
scripts.dev:shared: npm run build --workspace=packages/shared && npm run dev --workspace=packages/shared
scripts.dev:all: npm run build:shared && concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:export" "npm run dev:jobs"
scripts.build:api: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=apps/api
scripts.build:export: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=services/export
scripts.build:jobs: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=services/jobs

author: Sustainovate Team
